channel.title: D boots get wieleded to Hands
channel.description: So when I equip Dragon Boots they go right to my hands. When I look in the item.cfg Dragon_boots are not listed. So im guessing I have to add them and all that good stuff...But how do I do that? thank! :]

item.title: D boots get wieleded to Hands
item.dc:creator: @Benjamin1160 Benjamin1160
item.source: D boots get wieleded to Hands

item.title: D boots get wieleded to Hands
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

[quote=“R3minice, post:7, topic:426303”][quote author=dylan.hurley link=topic=528996.msg3859078#msg3859078 date=1324560768]

Item.java
Add the id of the boots into the boots array.

The default is wep so it’s in gloves so you got to also take it off gloves array or it will screw up
[/quote]
Oh, I thought he meant it went into his hand as a weapon.[/quote]
Idk you just got to make sure it’s only in boots array

Read full topic
item.source: D boots get wieleded to Hands

Item.java
Add the id of the boots into the boots array.
[/quote]
The default is wep so it’s in gloves so you got to also take it off gloves array or it will screw up[/quote]
Oh, I thought he meant it went into his hand as a weapon.
